title: gotcha with having subdataset on github with git-annex default branch
body:
I guess what is happening:
- we run `git annex init`, which modifies `uuid.log` within git-annex branch (also checked out)
- then we try to jump to `master` (or just the commitish pointed to by super dataset) but worktree uuid.log is different now from the one in git-annex branch, and following happens: (note that subdataset is a private repo so I would need to add you if you would like to reproduce)

```shell
$> datalad install -r https://github.com/ohbm-wannabe/ohbm2020-posters
install(ok): /home/yoh/proj/ohbm-wannabe/ohbm2020-posters (dataset)                                                     
[INFO   ] Installing Dataset(/home/yoh/proj/ohbm-wannabe/ohbm2020-posters) to get /home/yoh/proj/ohbm-wannabe/ohbm2020-posters recursively 
[INFO   ] Scanning for unlocked files (this may take some time) 
[INFO   ] Remote origin not usable by git-annex; setting annex-ignore                                                   
Installing: 0.00 datasets [00:04, ? datasets/s]CommandError: 'git checkout e04c101eca9998b6c99ff63f91362b79e02812aa' failed with exitcode 1 under /home/yoh/proj/ohbm-wannabe/ohbm2020-posters/abstracts-full
error: Your local changes to the following files would be overwritten by checkout:
	uuid.log
Please commit your changes or stash them before you switch branches.
Aborting
datalad install -r https://github.com/ohbm-wannabe/ohbm2020-posters  4.55s user 0.73s system 64% cpu 8.133 total
```
